title: 91 59 14 "Heading For Disaster""Goodbye Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!"Transliteration: "Sayōnara Doramujima! Boku wa umi e deru!" (Japanese:さようならドラム島!僕は海へ出る!) Harume Kosaka Michiru Shimada December 9, 2001(2001-12-09)[26] February 11, 2006[27]
